item.title: HOOPS SCOUTING USA 10-K
item.description: HOOPS SCOUTING USA, which is in the Services-Computer Processing & Data Preparation [7374] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 11, 2022 had 6735 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 142 instances financial - 124 instances statements - 89 instances 30 - 81 instances june - 76 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
